subName: Named will attract customers to pay attention to your place.
subDes: Write a short description helps customers know the highlights that only in your place.
subSpace: Write more information like bedroom, living room, parking area, outdoor relaxation space.
subRules: Some rules that guests need to follow when staying at your place.
subAddMore: Use the field below to share more information about your place
desExample1: - Spacious place, cool, vintage style of old Hanoi
desExample2: - From here, 100m to Ho Guom lake, 300m to Ho Chi Minh Mausoleum,...
spaceExample1: - Safe parking area, able to park cars and motorcycles
spaceExample3: - There is a free outdoor pool,...
rulesExample1: - Please turn off the device when leaving the place
name15Character: Warning ! The name must be at least 15 characters
name100Character: Warning ! The name must not exceed 100 characters
des50Character: Warning ! The description must be at least 50 characters
des500Character: Warning ! The description must not exceed 500 characters
space1000Character: Warning ! The space must not exceed 1000 characters
rules500Character: Warning ! The rules must not exceed 500 characters
